forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain between 11pm and midnight, then a slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the sun rises over Downtown San Francisco, the skyline greets the day mostly clear, with the gentle warmth of sunlight spilling over the city. With a high temperature expected to hover near 69, the air is crisp yet not biting, carried by a west-southwest breeze that whispers promises of autumn. Although the morning begins in clarity, one can sense the ebbs and flows of the marine layer, hinting at a slight turning of the tide around the Golden Gate, where wisps of fog may dance quietly along the edges of the bay.

As night approaches, a subtle chance of drizzle creeps in, cloaked beneath an increasingly cloudy demeanor, with temperatures dipping to around 57. The gusts will carry the coolness of evening, making a light jacket or sweater a wise companion for any stroll along the waterfront or through vibrant neighborhoods. Pay attention to the shifting moods of the day; it's a splendid time to explore the rich sounds and flavors of a local café's morning croissant or to indulge in a leisurely walk by the bay, with the sun casting golden reflections on the water, inviting contemplation.
